titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the ability of Medicare and Medicaid providers to access the National Practitioner Data Bank for the purpose of conducting employee background checks.
Promote Responsible Oversight and Targeted Employee background Check Transparency for Seniors Act
Promote Responsible Oversight and Targeted Employee background Check Transparency for Seniors Act
PROTECTS Act
PROTECTS Act
Promote Responsible Oversight and Targeted Employee background Check Transparency for Seniors Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
